items.title: Joshua and Paul earn riches but deliver budget sporting spectacle
items.description: Anthony Joshua earns one of the biggest paydays of his career - but where does his victory over Jake Paul leave both fighters and boxing?

items.title: Imran Khan and wife given further jail terms after state gift fraud case
items.description: Pakistan's former PM, who is already serving time in prison, plans to challenge the verdict.

items.title: IT issues cause Christmas getaway delays at Dover
items.description: The Port of Dover says earlier problems in Calais are causing processing delays of up to one hour.

items.title: Stupid or valid? Did Brook's shot put Australia on the brink?
items.description: Harry Brook's dismissal put England on the brink of Ashes defeat but was his reverse sweep stupid or valid?

items.title: Watch: Anthony Joshua beats Jake Paul via stoppage in one-sided contest
items.description: Anthony Joshua defeats YouTuber-turned-boxer Jake Paul as he secures a comfortable win via a sixth-round stoppage in Miami.
